mapper.select: SELECT EDU_NO , DEPT_NO , CATEGORY_NO , ESSENTIAL_YN , TITLE , CONTENTS , PERIOD_ST , PERIOD_ED , CONTENTS_TAG , FAVORITE_CNT , VIEW_CNT , USER_NO , INPUT_DT , TIME_STAMP FROM T_EDU WHERE EDU_NO = #{edu_no}

select edu_no, title, input_dt, view_cnt, essential_yn
from t_edu where 1=1
AND dept_no = #{dept_no}
AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{searchWord},'%')) OR contents LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{searchWord},'%')))
order by edu_no desc
mapper.update: update t_edu set view_cnt = view_cnt+1 where edu_no = #{edu_no}
mapper.select: select edu_no, title, essential_yn, dept_no, view_cnt, contents_tag, contents from t_edu where edu_no=#{no}

SELECT A.DEPT_NO , A.DEPT_NM , A.CATEGORY_NO , A.REF_NO , A.LEV_NO , (CASE WHEN CATEGORY_NO = -1 THEN CATEGORY_NO ELSE LEVEL END) LEV , A.CATEGORY_NM , A.CATEGORY_CNT , A.RN FROM ( SELECT A.DEPT_NO , A.DEPT_NM , B.CATEGORY_NM , NVL(B.CATEGORY_NO, -1) CATEGORY_NO , NVL(B.REF_NO, 0) REF_NO , NVL(B.LEV_NO, 0) LEV_NO , NVL(C.CATEGORY_CNT, 0) AS CATEGORY_CNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.DEPT_NO) RN FROM T_EDU_DEPT A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_EDU_CATEGORY B ON (A.DEPT_NO = B.DEPT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS CATEGORY_CNT , CATEGORY_NO FROM T_EDU GROUP BY CATEGORY_NO ) C ON (B.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) ) A START WITH A.REF_NO = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR A.CATEGORY_NO = A.REF_NO
